style=\"text-transform: uppercase;\">BEYOND+</span> Picks</span>',\n      func: removeListeners,\n    },\n  },\n};\n\n/* removes all event listeners from element */\nfunction removeListeners(el) {\n  var dupeEl = el.cloneNode(true);\n  el.parentNode.replaceChild(dupeEl, el);\n}\n\n/* checks b+ status  and swaps out banners */\nif (tagData) {\n  document.querySelector('#media-2').parentNode.style.display = 'flex';\n  const isRecognized =\n    tagData.account_type === 'recognized user' ||\n    tagData.account_type === 'logged in';\n  const isBPlus = tagData.beyond_plus_indicator === 'member';\n  if (isBPlus && isRecognized) {\n    replaceContent(variation, firstSection);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction replaceContent(contentObj, prevEl) {\n  Object.keys(contentObj).forEach(function(key) {\n    const value = contentObj[key];\n    if (typeof value === 'object') {\n      replaceContent(value, prevEl.querySelector(key));\n    } else if (key === 'html') {\n      prevEl.innerHTML = value;\n    } else if (key === 'text') {\n      prevEl.childNodes[0].nodeValue = value;\n    } else if (key === 'func') {\n      value(prevEl);\n    } else {\n      prevEl.setAttribute(key, value);\n    }\n  });\n}","selector":"#media-2,#first imgBaseUrl = 'https://b3h2.scene7.com/is/image/BedBathandBeyond/';\n\n  /* helper to construct the img src strings */\n  const getImg = {\n    src: function(str) {\n      return imgBaseUrl + str + '?$140$&wid=140&hei=140';\n    },\n    srcset: function(str) {\n      return (\n        imgBaseUrl +\n        str +\n        '?$140$&wid=140&hei=140 1x, ' +\n        imgBaseUrl +\n        str +\n        '?$140$&wid=210&hei=210 2x'\n      );\n    },\n  };\n\n  const PRODUCT_IDS = [\n    3278961,\n    3312152,\n    123682,\n    5172946,\n    1040825748,\n    3166366,\n    3318383,\n    5017466,\n    3183466,\n    3280199,\n    1013721289,\n    3293815,\n  ];\n\n  /*\n   * Constructs the carousel from cloned Recently Viewed container\n   *\n   */\n  function createVariation(data) {\n    bPlusCarouselEl.id = BP_SELECTOR;\n    replaceContent(\n      { h3: { html: 'BEYOND+ Faves' }, '.slick-track': { class: 'siema' } },\n      bPlusCarouselEl\n    );\n    const slideToDupe = bPlusCarouselEl.querySelector(\n      isMobile ? 'a[href$=\"#openReviewsModal\"]' : 'a[href$=\"#reviews\"]'\n    ).parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.innerHTML;\n\n    data.forEach(function(item, idx) {\n      const ratingWidth = (item.rating / 5) * 79;\n      const icid = '?icid=plab_bplus_hp_fave_' + (idx + 1);\n      const priceInfo =\n        '<div><span data-locator=\"pdp-pricetext\" class=\"plab-price' +\n        (item.wasPrice ? ' plab-price-red' : '') +\n        '\">' +\n        item.price +\n        '</span></div>' +\n        (item.wasPrice\n          ? '</div data-locator=\"pdp-waspricingcrossedlabel\" class=\"plab-wasprice\">' +\n            item.wasPrice +\n            '<div>'\n          : '');\n      const tileSelector =\n        (isMobile\n          ? 'div[class^=\"sm-mr2 sm-ml2 CertonaProductGrid\"]'\n          : '.slick-slide') +\n        ':nth-child(' +\n        (idx + 1) +\n        ')';\n      bPlusCarouselEl.querySelector(tileSelector).innerHTML = slideToDupe;\n      const slide = {\n        [tileSelector]: {\n          'div[data-locator^=\"certona_recentlyViewed_productimage\"]>a': {\n            href: '/store' + item.link + icid,\n            img: {\n              src: getImg.src(item.img),\n              srcset: getImg.srcset(item.img),\n              alt: item.title,\n            },\n          },\n\n          'div[tabindex=\"0\"].mb2': {\n            html: priceInfo,\n          },\n          'div[data-locator^=\"certona_recentlyViewed_producttitlelabel\"]>a': {\n            href: '/store' + item.link + icid,\n            html: item.title,\n          },\n          'div[data-locator^=\"certona_recentlyViewed_ratingcountlabel\"]': {\n            'svg:last-child': {\n              width: ratingWidth,\n              viewBox: '0 0 ' + ratingWidth + ' 15',\n            },\n            'div>div>span:first-child': {\n              html: item.reviews,\n            },\n            'div>div>span:last-child': {\n              html: item.reviews + ' reviews',\n              'aria-label': item.reviews + ' reviews',\n              title: item.reviews + ' reviews',\n            },\n          },\n          'a[href$=\"#reviews\"]': {\n            href: '/store' + item.link + '#reviews' + icid,\n          },\n          'div[data-locator^=\"certona_recentlyViewed_ideaboardicon\"]': {\n            html: '',\n          },\n        },\n      };\n      replaceContent(slide, bPlusCarouselEl);\n    });\n    /* inserts carousel and move top categories component after MSE promos container */\n    const topCategories = document.querySelector(\n      '#first>div[class*=\"VisualFacets-inline\"]'\n    );\n    const brandSpotlight = document.querySelector('#second>div:nth-child(2)');\n    firstSection.insertBefore(bPlusCarouselEl, topCategories);\n    if (topCategories && brandSpotlight) {\n      brandSpotlight.parentNode.insertBefore(topCategories, brandSpotlight);\n    }\n    if (!isMobile) {\n      startSlider(bPlusCarouselEl);\n    }\n    /* closes the loading loop */\n    firstSection.classList.remove('plab-test-loading');\n  }\n\n  /* using siema slider, a basic css-free microslider */\n  function startSlider(el) {\n    const bpId = '#' + el.id + ' ';\n    slider = new Siema({\n      perPage: 6,\n      duration: 400,\n    });\n    const nextButton = document.querySelector(bpId + '.slick-next>button');\n    const prevButton = document.querySelector(bpId + '.slick-prev>button');\n    nextButton.addEventListener('click', function() {\n      slider.next(6);\n      prevButton.parentNode.classList.remove('slick-disabled');\n      prevButton.removeAttribute('disabled');\n      nextButton.parentNode.classList.add('slick-disabled');\n      nextButton.setAttribute('disabled', '');\n    });\n    prevButton.addEventListener('click', function() {\n      slider.prev(6);\n      prevButton.parentNode.classList.add('slick-disabled');\n      prevButton.setAttribute('disabled', '');\n      nextButton.parentNode.classList.remove('slick-disabled');\n      nextButton.removeAttribute('disabled');\n    });\n  }\n\n  /* fetches product data from SOLR */\n  function getProducts(idArr) {\n    const ids = idArr.join(',');\n    fetch('/apis/v1.0/product?product=' + ids, {\n      headers: {\n        accept: 'application/json, text/plain, */*',\n        'accept-language': 'en-US,en;q=0.9',\n        'cache-control': 'no-cache',\n        pragma: 'no-cache',\n        'proxy-connection': 'keep-alive',\n        'x-bbb-site-id': 'BedBathUS',\n        xtalivepage: 'true',\n      },\n      body: null,\n      method: 'GET',\n      mode: 'cors',\n    })\n      .then(function(res) {\n        return res.json();\n      })\n      .then(function(prod) {\n        if (prod.serviceStatus === 'SUCCESS' && !prod.errorMessages.length) {\n          return formatData(prod.data);\n        } else throw prod.errorMessages;\n      })\n      .then(function(products) {\n        createVariation(products);\n      })\n      .catch(function(err) {\n        console.log('plab', err);\n        firstSection.classList.remove('plab-test-loading');\n      });\n  }\n\n  /* formats raw SOLR data */\n  function formatData(data) {\n    return data.map(function(item) {\n      return {\n        title: item.DISPLAY_NAME,\n        img: item.SCENE7_URL,\n        link: item.SEO_URL,\n        id: item.PRODUCT_ID,\n        rating: item.RATINGS ? Number(item.RATINGS) : null,\n        reviews: item.REVIEWS || null,\n        price:\n          item.SALE_PRICE_RANGE_STRING ||\n          item.PRICE_RANGE_STRING ||\n          item.IS_PRICE,\n        wasPrice: item.WAS_PRICE || null,\n      };\n    });\n  }\n\n  /* crawls though dom-like tree to modify components */\n  function replaceContent(contentObj, prevEl) {\n    Object.keys(contentObj).forEach(function(key) {\n      const value = contentObj[key];\n      if (typeof value === 'object') {\n        const currEl = prevEl.querySelector(key);\n        if (currEl) {\n          replaceContent(value, currEl);\n        }\n      } else if (key === 'html') {\n        prevEl.innerHTML = value;\n      } else if (key === 'func') {\n        value(prevEl);\n      } else {\n        prevEl.setAttribute(key, value);\n      }\n    });\n  }\n\n  /* checks beyond+ status and constructs carousel if member*/\n  if (tagData) {\n    const isRecognized =\n      tagData.account_type === 'recognized user' ||\n      tagData.account_type === 'logged in';\n    const isBPlus = tagData.beyond_plus_indicator === 'member';\n    if (isBPlus && isRecognized) {\n      getProducts(PRODUCT_IDS);\n    }\n  } else {\n    firstSection.classList.remove('plab-test-loading');\n  }\n}","selector":"#third>.mt2.hideOnPrint","id":"2392803"},{"id":"2425171","selector":"h4[class^=\"Breadcrumbs-inline\"]","campaign_id":"41966","html":"BEYOND+ Most Popular","trigger_counted":1,"counted":1,"criteria":[{"Type":"Path","ID":"1548661","Next":null,"PageCategory_ID":null,"path_criterion":"^/store/ideaboard/ib_beyond_plus_most_popular/559ef01739c364a5f5b95c044f7fcb8f(?#js_regex)(?#i)","Pre":null,"GroupNumber":null}]},{"campaign_id":"41966","html":"From the Beyond+ Team","counted":1,"trigger_counted":1,"criteria":[{"ID":"1548662","Next":null,"Pre":null,"PageCategory_ID":null,"path_criterion":"^/store/ideaboard/ib_beyond_plus_most_popular/559ef01739c364a5f5b95c044f7fcb8f(?#js_regex)(?#i)","Type":"Path","GroupNumber":null}],"id":"2425179","selector":"div[class^=\"IdeaboardDetailHeader\"]"},{"selector":"div[class^=\"grid-x ExpertPicks\"]","id":"2443654","trigger_counted":1,"counted":1,"campaign_id":"42178","css":{"display":"flex"},"criteria":[{"path_criterion":"^/store/category/(?!(?:bedding/sheets/sheet-sets/15415/|bath/bath-towels-rugs/bath-towels/13434/|kitchen/(?:cookware/pressure-cookers/14717/|small-appliances/(?:toasters-ovens/12061/|pressure-cookers/13630/))))(?#js_regex)(?#i)","PageCategory_ID":null,"Pre":null,"Next":null,"ID":"1561199","Type":"Path","GroupNumber":null}]},{"id":"2502547","custom":"function checkCookie() {\n  /* logic to ensure that user is on a new PDP product page */\n  try {\n    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;\n    const isPDP = /^\\/store\\/product\\//.test(currentPath);\n    const currentProd =\n      window.utag_data &&\n      window.utag_data.product_id &&\n      window.utag_data.product_id[0];\n    /* if product has changed, run cookie code */\n    if (\n      isPDP &&\n      currentPath !== window.plabPrevPath &&\n      currentProd !== window.plabPrevProd \n    ) {\n      clearInterval(window.plabIntervalC);\n      runCookie();\n      window.plabIntervalC = null;\n      window.plabPrevProd = currentProd;\n      window.plabPrevPath = currentPath;\n      /* if user navigated away from a PDP, stop checking */\n    } else if (!isPDP) {\n      clearInterval(window.plabIntervalC);\n    }\n  } catch (err) {\n    /* clears the interval in case of an error */\n    clearInterval(window.plabIntervalC);\n    console.log('plab err:', err);\n  }\n  /* cookie function code */\n  function runCookie() {\n    const PZ_ID = 'plabPZMod';\n\n    /* url parameter helper */\n    function getUrlParameter(name) {\n      name = name.replace(/[\\[]/, '\\\\[').replace(/[\\]]/, '\\\\]');\n      const regex = new RegExp('[\\\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)');\n      const results = regex.exec(location.search);\n      return results && decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\\+/g, ' '));\n    }\n    /* category id is grabbed from url OR L3 category OR L2 category, in that order */\n    const catId =\n      getUrlParameter('categoryId') ||\n      (window.utag_data &&\n        (window.utag_data.sub_sub_category_id ||\n          window.utag_data.subcategory_id));\n\n    function PzCookie(cookieId, days, maxLength, value) {\n      /* cookie get and set helpers */\n      this.maxLength = maxLength || 10;\n      this.cookieId = cookieId;\n      this.getCookie = function() {\n        const match = document.cookie.match(\n          new RegExp('(^| )' + this.cookieId + '=([^;]+)')\n        );\n        if (match) return match[2];\n        return null;\n      };\n      this.setCookie = function(val, days) {\n        let expires = '';\n        let date = new Date();\n        date.setTime(\n          date.getTime() + (days || this.days) * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000\n        );\n        expires = '; expires=' + date.toUTCString();\n        const cookieStr =\n          this.cookieId +\n          '=' +\n          (val || this.value || '') +\n          expires +\n          '; path=/';\n        document.cookie = cookieStr;\n      };\n      /* preset values and defaults */\n      this.value = value || this.getCookie();\n      this.days = days || 90;\n      /* set category id and increment / set number of times visited */\n      this.setValue = function(id, num) {\n        if (this.value) {\n          if (this.getValue(id) !== null) {\n            let cookieObj = this.toObj();\n            cookieObj[id] = num || parseInt(cookieObj[id]) + 1;\n            this.value = objToStr(cookieObj);\n          } else {\n            let cookieArr = this.toArr();\n            if (cookieArr.length >= 10) {\n              cookieArr.pop();\n              this.value = arrToStr(cookieArr);\n            }\n            const newValue = id + ':' + (num || '1') + ',' + this.value;\n            this.value = newValue;\n          }\n        } else {\n          this.value = id + ':' + (num || '1');\n        }\n        this.setCookie();\n      };\n      /* get number of times category id has been visited */\n      this.getValue = function(id) {\n        const idArr = this.toArr();\n        const result = idArr.filter(function(item) {\n          return item[0] === id.toString();\n        });\n        return result.length ? result[0][1] : null;\n      };\n      /* converts cookie string to array */\n      this.toArr = function() {\n        return this.value\n          ? this.value.split(',').map(function(val) {\n              return val.split(':');\n            })\n          : [];\n      };\n      /* converts cookie string to object */\n      this.toObj = function() {\n        const pzArr = this.toArr();\n        return pzArr.reduce(function(obj, item) {\n          obj[item[0]] = item[1];\n          return obj;\n        }, {});\n      };\n      this.sortByTally = function() {\n        const pzArr = this.toArr();\n        const sortedArr = pzArr.sort(function(a, b) {\n          intA = parseInt(a[1]);\n          intB = parseInt(b[1]);\n          if (intA > intB) return -1;\n          if (intA < intB) return 1;\n          return 0;\n        });\n        this.value = arrToStr(sortedArr);\n      };\n      /* converts cookie data array to string */\n      function arrToStr(cookieArr) {\n        return cookieArr.reduce(function(str, curr, idx) {\n          return (\n            str +\n            curr[0] +\n            ':' +\n            curr[1] +\n            (idx !== cookieArr.length - 1 ? ',' : '')\n          );\n        }, '');\n      }\n      /* converts cookie object to string */\n      function objToStr(cookieObj) {\n        const cookieKeys = Object.keys(cookieObj);\n        return cookieKeys.reduce(function(str, key) {\n          const cookieStr =\n            str +\n            key +\n            ':' +\n            cookieObj[key] +\n            (cookieKeys[cookieKeys.length - 1] !== key ? ',' : '');\n          return cookieStr;\n        }, '');\n      }\n    }\n\n    const testCookie = new PzCookie(PZ_ID, 60);\n    catId && testCookie.setValue(catId);\n  }\n}\n\n/* try until utag data and url have been updated */\nif (!window.plabIntervalC)\n  window.plabIntervalC = setInterval(checkCookie, 1000);","selector":"div[class*='ProductDetails-inline_'] span[class*='PDPPrice_']:first-child","criteria":[{"ID":"1605807","Next":null,"path_criterion":"^\\/store\\/product\\/(?#js_regex)(?#i)","PageCategory_ID":null,"Pre":null,"Type":"Path","GroupNumber":"1"}],"campaign_id":"42896","counted":0,"trigger_counted":1},{"selector":".mseBtmMargin:nth-child(-n+2)","counted":0,"trigger_counted":1,"campaign_id":"42967","criteria":[{"GroupNumber":null,"Pre":null,"PageCategory_ID":null,"path_criterion":"^/(store/?)?($|\\?)(?#js_regex)","Next":null,"ID":"1614166","Type":"Path"}]},{"criteria":[{"GroupNumber":"1","Type":"Path","PageCategory_ID":null,"path_criterion":"/(?#contains)","Pre":null,"Next":null,"ID":"1639116"}],"trigger_counted":1,"counted":1,"campaign_id":"43058","selector":"span.StoreSelector_2LtS6J","custom":"// Define time Array as empty initial state\n// Define current day as index ex [Monday = 1]\nvar timeArray = [];\nvar d = new Date();\nvar day = d.getDay();\nvar closeTime;\n\nfunction changeTime() {\n    // Get Times => [span,span,span]\n    var times = document.querySelectorAll('.StoreSelector_39olaz span:nth-child(2)');\n\n    // Loop and Push to time string to Array\n    // return array ex.\n    // [\"9:00am - 9:30pm\", \"9:00am - 9:30pm\", \"10:00am - 7:00pm\"]\n    for (var i = 0; i < times.length; i++) {\n        timeArray.push(times[i].innerHTML)\n    }\n\n    // Return portion of time string after dash\n    function getSecondPart(str) {\n        return str.split('-')[1];\n    }\n\n    // define close time\n    switch (day) {\n        case 0:\n            closeTime = getSecondPart(timeArray[2]).trim();\n            break;\n        case 1:\n            closeTime = getSecondPart(timeArray[0]).trim();\n            break;\n        case 2:\n            closeTime = getSecondPart(timeArray[0]).trim();\n            break;\n        case 3:\n            closeTime = getSecondPart(timeArray[0]).trim();\n            break;\n        case 4:\n            closeTime = getSecondPart(timeArray[0]).trim();\n            break;\n        case 5:\n            closeTime = getSecondPart(timeArray[0]).trim();\n            break;\n        case 6:\n            closeTime = getSecondPart(timeArray[1]).trim();\n    }\n\n    // insert `closeTime` into dom\n    var elem = document.querySelector('.StoreSelector_7LE6pb.py1');\n    // Get HTML content\n    var html = elem.innerHTML;\n    // Set HTML content\n    if (closeTime.indexOf('Close') === -1) {\n        elem.innerHTML = 'CLOSES AT ' + closeTime;\n    } else {\n        elem.innerHTML = 'CLOSED'\n    }\n}\n\nsetTimeout(function() {\n    changeTime();\n}, 400)","id":"2546000"},{"campaign_id":"42854","css":{},"id":"2492488","custom":"if (window.plabNgsStore && !document.querySelector('.ngs-container')) {\r\n  const storeNo = window.plabNgsStore.toString();\r\n  const firstSecEl = document.querySelector('#first');\r\n  const ngsComponentEl = -1756)\"/> </svg> <span></span> </a> </div> </div> </div>';\r\n\r\n  ngsComponentEl.innerHTML = baseHTML;\r\n\r\n  function dateFormatter(hours) {\r\n    let pmHours = hours[1].split(':');\r\n    pmHours[0] = Number(pmHours[0]) + 12;\r\n    return {\r\n      'time:first-child': {\r\n        datetime: hours[0],\r\n        html: hours[0] + 'am',\r\n      },\r\n      'time:last-child': {\r\n        datetime: pmHours.join(':'),\r\n        html: hours[1] + 'pm',\r\n      },\r\n    };\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  const store = ngsStores[storeNo];\r\n\r\n  const storeTemplate = {\r\n    '.ngs-username': {\r\n      html: userName,\r\n    },\r\n    '.ngs-storename': {\r\n      html: store.name,\r\n    },\r\n    '.ngs-storetitle': {\r\n      html: store.name,\r\n    },\r\n    '.ngs-address': {\r\n      html: store.address,\r\n    },\r\n    'tr:nth-child(1)': dateFormatter(store.wkHours),\r\n    'tr:nth-child(2)': dateFormatter(store.satHours),\r\n    'tr:nth-child(3)': dateFormatter(store.sunHours),\r\n    '.ngs-directions': {\r\n      href: store.dir,\r\n    },\r\n    '.ngs-number': {\r\n      href: 'tel:1-' + store.phone,\r\n      span: {\r\n        html: store.phone,\r\n      },\r\n    },\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  /* append and modify content */\r\n  replaceContent(storeTemplate, ngsComponentEl);\r\n  const moreInfoEl = ngsComponentEl.querySelector('.ngs-moreinfo');\r\n  const contentEl = moreInfoEl.parentNode;\r\n  const allContentChildren = contentEl.querySelectorAll('.ngs-box *');\r\n\r\n  firstSecEl.appendChild(ngsComponentEl);\r\n  \r\n  \r\n  function addContentListeners() {\r\n    moreInfoEl.addEventListener('click', expandContent);\r\n    moreInfoEl.addEventListener('focus', expandContent);\r\n    moreInfoEl.addEventListener('touchend', expandContent);\r\n    document.body.addEventListener('click', hideContent);\r\n    document.body.addEventListener('touchend', hideContent);\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function expandContent(e) {\r\n    e.stopPropagation();\r\n    contentEl.classList.add('expanded');\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  function hideContent(e) {\r\n    let shouldClose = true;\r\n    allContentChildren.forEach(function(el) {\r\n      if (e.target === el) {\r\n        shouldClose = false;\r\n      } \r\n    });\r\n    if (shouldClose) contentEl.classList.remove('expanded');\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  /* crawls though dom-like tree to modify components */\r\n  function replaceContent(contentObj, prevEl) {\r\n    Object.keys(contentObj).forEach(function(key) {\r\n      const value = contentObj[key];\r\n      if (typeof value === 'object') {\r\n        replaceContent(value, prevEl.querySelector(key));\r\n      } else if (key === 'html') {\r\n        prevEl.innerHTML = value;\r\n      } else if (key === 'text') {\r\n        prevEl.childNodes[0].nodeValue = value;\r\n      } else if (key === 'func') {\r\n        value(prevEl);\r\n      } else {\r\n        prevEl.setAttribute(key, value);\r\n      }\r\n    });\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  /* event tracker util for Sitespect */\r\n  function trackSS(payload, target, event) {\r\n    if (window.SS && window.SS.EventTrack) {\r\n      if (target) {\r\n        const el = document.querySelector(target);\r\n        el.addEventListener(event || 'click', function() {\r\n          window.SS.EventTrack.rp(payload);\r\n        });\r\n      } else {\r\n        window.SS.EventTrack.rp(payload);\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  /* attach all listeners & trackers */\r\n  addContentListeners();\r\n  trackSS('plab-ngs-directions1', '.ngs-directions');\r\n  trackSS('plab-ngs-moreinfo1', '.ngs-moreinfo', 'touchstart');\r\n  trackSS('plab-ngs-callus1', '.ngs-number');\r\n  trackSS('plab-ngs-loaded1');\r\n}\r\n","attributes":{},"trigger_counted":1,"counted":0,"criteria":[{"GroupNumber":null,"PageCategory_ID":null,"Pre":null,"path_criterion":"^/(store/?)?($|\\?)(?#js_regex)(?#i)","ID":"1597592","Next":null,"Type":"Path"}],"selector":"#first>div[class*=\"VisualFacets-inline\"]"}],"timestamps":{"2425171":"1554834301","2515105":"1554474824","2546000":"1555099471","2502547":"1554901815","2443654":"1554487094","2492488":"1554143187","2392803":"1554834301","2369051":"1554834301","2425179":"1554834301"}};if(window.SS&&SS.Require){SS.Require(function(){window.ss_dom_var?window.ss_dom_var.setVariations(s):window.__ss_variations=s;});}else{window.ss_dom_var?window.ss_dom_var.setVariations(s):window.__ss_variations=s;}if(s.control_sv_cv_rp_only){window.__ss_control=true;}}();
(window.webpackJsonp=window.webpackJsonp||[]).push([[3],[]]);

var _cf = _cf || []; _cf.push(['_setFsp', true]); _cf.push(['_setBm', true]); _cf.push(['_setAu', '/resources/f1008083f316409f7a12b44fcb4fc4']);
